posts.postText:
I have ran into a problem... One of my Dead Island Nv2 crew mates, wont be buying the game. Which means that I will have to play Dead Island With only one other person in two weeks time. If you are already buying Dead Island, for PC, then post here if you would like to join me for some zombie killing fun.

(2/4) Slots Opem!
Me - Sohisohi
Nv2 Clan Mate
And hopefully two (2) more people from NNJG.

Note, that we will be playing together. No one can go ahead unless asking the group First. It's Just how we roll.
that game looks like a huge ripoff of left for dead 2, and it's probably more fun..
